dc_title_s: General Land Office Plats: Polk County, Iowa, 1836-1859
dc_description_s: This is a raster dataset of georeferenced township maps from the General Land Office (GLO) surveys beginning in 1836 through 1859. The source of the georeferenced images is scanned microfilm of plats from the State Archives. These plats represent maps drawn from the original field notes by the Surveyor General's Dubuque office.
